title: Tasuuketsu
overview: The WEB Comic "Tasuketsu" by Miyakawa Taiga serialized in manga app "GANMA!" is finally becoming an anime!Â The game began suddenly. It was "Tasuketsu," a brutal survival game in which the majority is eliminated. In order to fight back against the immensely powerful emperor masterminding the game, young men and women create their own futures using the mysterious special ability known as "Special Right."
